name: Serveur_questions
author: Samuel Drode <samuel.drode@gmail.com>, Louis Ortolan, Amandine Pallas <amandine.pallau@gmail.com>, Julien Riffard <julien.riffard40@gmail.com>, Kim Savaroche <kimsavinfo@gmail.com>

scripts.upload-to-coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
